      Methods in com.projectpeople.springboot2restservicebasic.search that return types with arguments of type Book 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Book> SearchService.search(java.lang.String term)
      Unimplemented search function, returns books that match the term
      java.util.List<Book> SearchServiceImp.search(java.lang.String term)
      Implemented search method This searches through all stored books, returning any books that have the search term in the title or in the otherDetails
      java.util.List<Book> SearchController.searchForBook(java.lang.String term)
      Url implementation of the search functionality Using the url /search/{term} where the term is what is being searched This uses the searchService for the business logic
